metadata.title: CVE-2011-2764 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: The FS_CheckFilenameIsNotExecutable function in qcommon/files.c in theioQuake3 engine 1.36 and earlier, as used in World of Padman, Smokin' Guns,OpenArena, Tremulous, and ioUrbanTerror, does not properly determinedangerous file extensions, which allows remote attackers to executearbitrary code via a crafted third-party addon that creates a Trojan horseDLL file.

criterions.comment: openarena package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
